attributes.action: Take a stand on Christain values not being forced out of society
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
An alarming article in a Sunday newspaper states that MPs want God fearing remnants of the empire to downgrade Christianity. 
The article states that the Foreign Affairs Committee is pressing for change amid claims that references to traditional Christian morality could undermine gay rights and those of other faiths - our country is first and foremost a Christian country and Christians should have a voice, it is so that we live in a multi faith society but we should be able to stand up for what we believe, it is not about discrimination of a particular group or body of people but about standing for what is right and true.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
